pr_title: [NCL-6237] Could set closed milestone as current

timeline.bodyText: use Product milestone mapper method to get id mapper to map the milestone id.
timeline.author: janinko

timeline.bodyText: newMilestoneId can't be null, because if entity.getCurrentProductMilestone().getId() is null, then you get NPE.
timeline.author: janinko

timeline.bodyText: use Product version mapper method to get id mapper to map the product version id.
timeline.author: janinko

timeline.message: [NCL-6237] Could set closed milestone as current

timeline.bodyText: mapper is not ProductMilestoneMapper, is it?
timeline.author: janinko

replies.bodyText: depends on time when you look at it
replies.author: jomrazek
